properties.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet/South Lincoln County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 2:39PM MST until February 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches.
Winds gusting to 25 mph will also cause some minor drifting this
evening.

* WHERE...Southern Lincoln County.

* WHEN...Snow will develop by early evening, then diminish after
midnight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or
visiting www.cotrip.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY
